description:
http://anidb.net/ch77203 [Kurihara Yuki] has been finally granted her wish of dating her crush http://anidb.net/ch77204 [Momotsuki Shin`ya] a.k.a. Momo. At first glance, Yuki looks like a normal but very cute girl. However, she is in fact a maniac over Momo, taking notes of his activities and never missing the chance to see him. Momo, on the other hand, is inexperienced in love and just wants to make Yuki happy.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Second year high school student Kurihara Yuki (Kurihara-san) falls in love at first sight with Momotsuki Shinya (Momo-kun), a boy one year her junior, and confesses her feelings to him. They begin dating, but Momokuri-san is actually a slightly (?) unusual girls who already knows everything there is to know about Momo-kun! Though Momo-kun and Kurihara-san have officially begun dating, Kurihara-san is still up to her usual antics such as lying in wait for Momo-kun and holding onto his straws after he`s finished using them. While she finds her behavior exasperating, her friend Mizuyama Norika warmly watches over her. Meanwhile, Momo-kun begins to grow curious over Kurihara-san`s strange words and behavior...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 告白... ももくんと栗原さん

REGULAR.description:
Second year high school student Kurihara Yuki (Kurihara-san) falls in love at first sight with Momotsuki Shinya (Momo-kun), a boy one year her junior, and confesses her feelings to him. They begin dating, but Momokuri-san is actually a slightly (?) unusual girls who already knows everything there is to know about Momo-kun! Though Momo-kun and Kurihara-san have officially begun dating, Kurihara-san is still up to her usual antics such as lying in wait for Momo-kun and holding onto his straws after he`s finished using them. While she finds her behavior exasperating, her friend Mizuyama Norika warmly watches over her. Meanwhile, Momo-kun begins to grow curious over Kurihara-san`s strange words and behavior...
Source: crunchyroll

When Kurihara-san asks Momo-kun out on a date, she is excited to see Momo-kun dressed in the casual clothes she doesn`t get to see at school and learn new things about him. Then Momo-kun has his first birthday since the couple has begun dating. Kurihara-san does her best to create a homemade present for him, but... Kurihara-san invites Momo-kun`s classmates Rihito and Shota and Kurihara-san`s friend Norika to a study session to prepare for their final exams. When they all arrive at Momo-kun`s room, Kurihara-san is unbearably nervous. Meanwhile, Momo-kun is bothered when he sees Rihito and Shota being friendly with Kurihara-san.
Source: crunchyroll

Source: crunchyroll

Kurihara-san and Norika receive a lesson on potatoes from a young boy (?) they run into at the supermarket. The boy (?) is actually Rio, one of Momo-kun`s female classmates. Rio, who has developed a crush on Momo-kun, refuses to acknowledge Kurihara-san is worthy of being Momo-kun`s girlfriend... Momo-kun grows concerned when Rihito and his other friends point out that there`s a strange distance between him and Kurihara-san. Momo-kun gathers all his courage to close the distance between them. Meanwhile, Kurihara-san is seen while secretly watching Momo-kun as usual! And the person who sees her is...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rio, I Want to Protect My Momotsuki!!
莉央, 私の守りたい桃月!!

REGULAR.description:
Kurihara-san and Norika receive a lesson on potatoes from a young boy (?) they run into at the supermarket. The boy (?) is actually Rio, one of Momo-kun`s female classmates. Rio, who has developed a crush on Momo-kun, refuses to acknowledge Kurihara-san is worthy of being Momo-kun`s girlfriend... Momo-kun grows concerned when Rihito and his other friends point out that there`s a strange distance between him and Kurihara-san. Momo-kun gathers all his courage to close the distance between them. Meanwhile, Kurihara-san is seen while secretly watching Momo-kun as usual! And the person who sees her is...
Source: crunchyroll

Momo-kun somehow manages to get through final exams. However, Kurihara-san says she has to leave early to take care of something important, and he spots her with his classmate Rio. Meanwhile, Kurihara-san gets Rio involved in a particular act while attempting to get to know Momo-kun better. Curious as to why Kurihara-san prioritized seeing Rio over himself, Momo-kun finally decides to ask her directly, but... for some reason, Kurihara-san is in trouble?! The first year friends decide to have a barbecue together, and Momo-kun calls Kurihara-san to invite her.
Source: crunchyroll

The first year friends decide to have a barbecue together, and Momo-kun calls Kurihara-san to invite her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rio and Kuri Suddenly Get Close!?
莉央と栗原, 急接近!?

REGULAR.description:
Kurihara-san agrees to go to the barbecue. The super excited Kurihara-san prepares for the barbecue by going shopping with Norika. The day of the barbecue, she engages in lively conversation with Momo-kun`s friends, and everyone seems to be having fun, but there`s something Momo-kun just can`t say... Eating meat, frolicking about, and blowing bubbles, Kurihara-san and her friends enjoy the barbecue each in their own way. However, the low temperatures keep them from playing in the water, which means Kurihara-san will lose her chance to show off her swimsuit to Momo-kun?! The thought depresses Kurihara-san, but when Momo-kun sees how she`s feeling...
Source: crunchyroll

However, the low temperatures keep them from playing in the water, which means Kurihara-san will lose her chance to show off her swimsuit to Momo-kun?! The thought depresses Kurihara-san, but when Momo-kun sees how she`s feeling...
Source: crunchyroll

Momo-kun and Kurihara-san head to the festival together. Momo-kun blushes when he sees how cute Kurihara-san is in her yukata. While walking around the stalls, Momo-kun realizes the older Kurihara-san is taking the lead. He makes up his mind to lead the two of them, but he becomes separated from Kurihara-san in the crowd. Momo-kun is saved by Rio at the festival, but because his phone`s battery is dead and he`s unable to call her, he asks for help looking for Kurihara-san. Unable to tell to Momo-kun that she actually has Kurihara-san`s number, Rio reaches out to Kurihara-san and meets her at the shrine...
Source: crunchyroll

Unable to tell to Momo-kun that she actually has Kurihara-san`s number, Rio reaches out to Kurihara-san and meets her at the shrine...
Source: crunchyroll

While doing summer assignments with Rihito and Shouta at a family restaurant, Momo-kun develops a fever and goes down for the count. Rihito plans to have Kurihara-san visit Momo-kun at his house. With Momo-kun sick and Kurihara-san caring for him, the two of them get to spend some time alone together in his room. While Momo-kun is asleep with a fever, Kurihara-san thinks about taking a picture of him, but... she begins making porridge as though she suddenly remembered that`s what she meant to do. Kurihara-san simply watches Momo-kun as he sleeps soundly, and when he awakes, she speaks to him before leaving. Later, Momo-kun recalls the events of another day while resting in bed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Momo-kun no Yuuutsu, Kaze no Hi ni
Momo-kun`s Melancholy on a Sick Day
ももくんの憂鬱, 風邪の日に

REGULAR.description:
While doing summer assignments with Rihito and Shouta at a family restaurant, Momo-kun develops a fever and goes down for the count. Rihito plans to have Kurihara-san visit Momo-kun at his house. With Momo-kun sick and Kurihara-san caring for him, the two of them get to spend some time alone together in his room. While Momo-kun is asleep with a fever, Kurihara-san thinks about taking a picture of him, but... she begins making porridge as though she suddenly remembered that`s what she meant to do. Kurihara-san simply watches Momo-kun as he sleeps soundly, and when he awakes, she speaks to him before leaving. Later, Momo-kun recalls the events of another day while resting in bed.
Source: crunchyroll

Kurihara-san heads to the pool with Momo-kun and his friends, where she`s excited to see Momo-kun in a swimsuit for the first time. On the way home, Momo-kun walks Kurihara-san to her bus stop as usual, but in order to reverse their relationship of her taking the lead all the time, he finally decides to take action! Though he succeeds in stopping Kurihara-san, Momo-kun finds himself unable to lead her properly and is at a loss. Feeling as though Kurihara-san never sees him as a man, without thinking, Momo-kun... Kurihara-san is bewildered when she sees this new side of Momo-kun, and...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ビーチボールパニック

Kurihara-san is bewildered when she sees this new side of Momo-kun, and...
Source: crunchyroll

Summer vacation ends and the new semester begins. Kurihara-san, who hasn`t seen Momo-kun since their day at the pool, is nervous about seeing Momo-kun again. Thinking she`s acting strangely, Momo-kun calls Kurihara-san that night. Meanwhile, worried about how others perceive Kurihara-san`s actions, Norika secretly investigates Rihito. Momo-kun and Kurihara-san go on a date at the amusement park. Momo-kun does his best to lead Kurihara-san, but he`s so nervous he loses his mind when Kurihara-san clings to his arm in the haunted house. Suddenly, the lights in the haunted house go out, and the two of them are left alone in the darkness.
Source: crunchyroll

Suddenly, the lights in the haunted house go out, and the two of them are left alone in the darkness.
Source: crunchyroll

Momo-kun and Rio are chosen by their class to participate in the music festival`s costume contest. Worried that he`s unable to close the distance between himself and Kurihara-san, Kurihara-san`s lack of jealousy towards him begins to bother Momo-kun. The day of the contest, Kurihara-san is extremely excited to see Momo-kun in costume. Momo-kun loses his patience with Kurihara-san`s total lack of jealousy, jumps off stage, and drags Kurihara-san by the hand up to the roof.
Source: crunchyroll

Source: crunchyroll

The bond between them has deepened, but when Kurihara-san accidentally confesses that she collects Momo-kun`s used products, she worries that he might not like her anymore. However, Momo-kun invites Kurihara-san to the game center, where he acts differently towards her than normal... Momo-kun eats a lunch made by Kurihara-san. Though the side dishes are all his favorite foods, he finds it strange when can`t recall telling Kurihara-san about them. Kurihara-san has been researching Momo-kun, and behind her research on Momo-kun is a secret collaborator!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Secret of Omelet Rice a la Tartare
タルタルオムライスの秘密

REGULAR.description:
Before the second semester`s final exams, Momo-kun`s friends once again come to his house to study. In order to avoid extra classes and retaking the exams over Christmas, Momo-kun does his best to study, but he tragically ends up failing. Meanwhile, Kurihara-san, who was looking forward to Christmas, experiences her own problem... Kurihara-san becomes unable to attend the Christmas Eve party her friends planned when she gets sick. Norika secretly invites Momo-kun to Kurihara-san`s house to comfort her depressed friend. Though Kurihara-san is shocked by his sudden visit, she still wants to be with Momo-kun...
Source: crunchyroll

Meanwhile, Kurihara-san, who was looking forward to Christmas, experiences her own problem... Kurihara-san becomes unable to attend the Christmas Eve party her friends planned when she gets sick. Norika secretly invites Momo-kun to Kurihara-san`s house to comfort her depressed friend. Though Kurihara-san is shocked by his sudden visit, she still wants to be with Momo-kun...
Source: crunchyroll

Momo-kun and Kurihara-san go on a hot spring trip with their friends. When Momo-kun gets mixed up with a trio of girls, Kurihara-san sees him surrounded by them at the worst possible time. The girls apologize and make excuses, but Kurihara-san doesn`t seem bothered in the slightest. Unable to conceal his irritation with her, Momo-kun leaves the area. The couple experiences a miscommunication at the hot spring inn. Momo-kun begins to feel his love and Kurihara-san`s love may not be the same thing. Kurihara-san chases after Momo-kun to respond to his direct feelings by confessing everything she feels for him. And when Momo-kun accepts her feelings...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 小桃小栗 Love Love物语
